response.overview: Camel's fourth studio album, Moonmadness, originally released in 1976, returns in a 2023 remastered and expanded edition. This release features a newly remastered original stereo mix by Ben Wiseman, alongside fresh stereo and 5.1 surround sound mixes crafted by Stephen W. Tayler. The immersive surround mix brings renewed clarity and depth to the band's intricate compositions, highlighting standout tracks like "Lunar Sea" and "Air Born." Additionally, the edition includes four bonus tracks drawn from 1976 demo sessions and the single version of "Another Night," as well as an illustrated booklet with an essay. The Blu-ray also features a concert video of Camel Live at Hammersmith Odeon in April 1976, offering a comprehensive experience for progressive rock enthusiasts.
response.title: Camel - Moonmadness (2023 Remaster)
